Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.31056261] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=4-8μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=1-2μM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=1-2μM), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=4μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=1-2μM), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=1-2μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=2-4μM), Acinetobacter baumannii (MIC=2-4μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.31056261] 0.6% hemolysis at 100 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-nagetive bacteria.

Literature.Title: A significantly enhanced antibacterial spectrum of D-enantiomeric lipopeptide bactenecin.
Literature.Reference: Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2019 Jun 25;514(2)497-502. doi 10.1016/j.bbrc.2019.04.153. Epub 2019 May 2
